# lodash.find v3.2.1

The [modern build](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/wiki/Build-Differences) of [lodashâ€™s](https://lodash.com/) `_.find` exported as a [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/)/[io.js](https://iojs.org/) module.

## Installation

Using npm:

```bash
$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.find
```

In Node.js/io.js:

```js
var find = require('lodash.find');
```

See the [documentation](https://lodash.com/docs#find) or [package source](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/blob/3.2.1-npm-packages/lodash.find) for more details.
